info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 1:09AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Vernon and north central Richland Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 108 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near La Farge, or 16 miles northeast of Viroqua, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hillsboro around 130 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Rockton, Wildcat Mountain State Park, Bartons Corners, Avalanche, Highway 80 And County C C, White City, Benders Corners, Trippville, Yuba and Mount Tabor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
